caption.p: ( a) Equilibrium swelling values for the PC12, PC12K hydrogels, and their antibiotic-loaded counterparts; ( b) electrical conductance variation in the PC12: antibiotic aqueous system (the equilibrium swelling values from Figure 10a take into account the mass of released antibiotic; T: tetracycline hydrochloride, A: amoxicillin; G: gentamicin sulfate).
